location.zh-cn: 中国黑龙江省哈尔滨市

description.zh-cn: 黑龙江省哈尔滨市下辖的一个市辖区，旧称新曙光区。在第二次世界大战中，这里曾是日本731部队的总部所在地。
description.en: A municipal district of Harbin, Heilongjiang Province, formerly known as Xishuguang District. During World War II, it was the headquarters of the Japanese Unit 731.
The capital city of Heilongjiang Province, China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的省级行政区。
description.en: A province of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国的一种县级行政区划。
description.en: A type of county-level administrative division in China.

description.zh-cn: 大日本帝国陆军在第二次世界大战期间设立的生物战研究单位。
description.en: A covert biological and chemical warfare research and development unit of the Imperial Japanese Army during World War II.

description.zh-cn: 一种利用生物毒素或细菌、病毒等致病微生物作为武器的战争形式。
description.en: A form of warfare that uses biological toxins or infectious agents such as bacteria, viruses, and fungi as weapons.

nodes.id: 侵华日军第七三一部队罪证陈列馆

zh-cn: 侵华日军第七三一部队罪证陈列馆
en: Exhibition Hall of Evidence of War Crimes by Unit 731 of the Japanese Army of Aggression

location.zh-cn: 中国黑龙江省哈尔滨市平房区

description.zh-cn: 位于731部队总部原址的战争罪行博物馆。
description.en: A museum on the former site of the headquarters of Unit 731, documenting its war crimes.

description.zh-cn: 平房区是哈尔滨市下辖的一个市辖区。
description.en: Pingfang District is a municipal district under the jurisdiction of Harbin.

description.zh-cn: 哈尔滨市是黑龙江省的省会城市。
description.en: Harbin is the capital city of Heilongjiang Province.
The headquarters of Unit 731 was located in Pingfang District.

description.zh-cn: 731部队在第二次世界大战期间活动。
description.en: Unit 731 was active during World War II.

description.zh-cn: 731部队是日本在第二次世界大战期间的生物战部队。
description.en: Unit 731 was a biological warfare unit of Japan during World War II.

description.zh-cn: 731部队是进行生物战争的部队。
description.en: Unit 731 was a unit that conducted biological warfare.

description.zh-cn: 日本在销毁证据时烧毁了平房区的绝大部分建筑。
description.en: Japan burned down the vast majority of buildings in Pingfang District to destroy evidence.

relationships.source: 侵华日军第七三一部队罪证陈列馆

description.zh-cn: 侵华日军第七三一部队罪证陈列馆位于平房区。
description.en: The Exhibition Hall of Evidence of War Crimes by Unit 731 is located in Pingfang District.
